mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wx_dish_stores ( id, weid, title, logo, info, announce, tel, location_p, location_c, location_a, address, lat, lng, password, hours, recharging_password, thumb_url, enable_wifi, enable_card, enable_room, enable_park, is_rest, is_show, is_meal, is_delivery, is_reservation, is_queue, delivery_within_days, delivery_radius, not_in_delivery_radius, sendingprice, consume, level, updatetime, dateline, content, begintime, endtime ) VALUES ( replace(uuid(),'-',''), #{weid}, #{title}, #{logo}, #{info}, #{announce}, #{tel}, #{location_p}, #{location_c}, #{location_a}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{password}, #{hours}, #{recharging_password}, #{thumb_url}, #{enable_wifi}, #{enable_card}, #{enable_room}, #{enable_park}, #{is_rest}, #{is_show}, #{is_meal}, #{is_delivery}, #{is_reservation}, #{is_queue}, #{delivery_within_days}, #{delivery_radius}, #{not_in_delivery_radius}, #{sendingprice}, #{consume}, #{level}, #{updatetime}, #{dateline}, #{content}, #{begintime}, #{endtime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT store.id, store.weid, store.title, store.logo, store.info, store.announce, store.tel, store.location_p, store.location_c, store.location_a, store.address, store.lat, store.lng, store.password, store.hours, store.recharging_password, store.thumb_url, store.enable_wifi, store.enable_card, store.enable_room, store.enable_park, store.is_rest, store.is_show, store.is_meal, store.is_delivery, store.is_reservation, store.is_queue, store.delivery_within_days, store.delivery_radius, store.not_in_delivery_radius, store.sendingprice, store.consume, store.level, store.updatetime, store.dateline, store.content, store.begintime, store.endtime FROM wx_dish_stores store where store.weid = #{weid}
and store.TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{title},'%')
and store.tel like CONCAT('%',#{tel},'%')
and concat(store.location_p,store.location_c,store.location_a,store.address) like CONCAT('%',#{address},'%')
